page.title: 16TRANSPORT
page.content: {Public Transport} Hanney has a regular bus service. The busses come from Wantage and carry passengers to Oxford, Grove, Wantage and Abingdon. Buses run every hour to Wantage and the fare is 50p each way. {Private Transport} Most people in the villige have their own transport, either car or bike. {Comunity Services} There are special buses which take school children to and from school. There is a private bus that takes people to Tesco's. Tesco's is a large super store. {Railway Stations} The nearest railway station is at Didcot. Didcot is about 16 kilometres from Hanney.
